ops.title: Flank
ops.additionalRules: Divide the zona de combate into two flanks (left and right) by drawing an imaginary line that's just like the centreline, except it runs from the centre of each player's zona de combate edge. Un operativo contests a flank while both wholly within it and within their opponent's territory. operativos amigos control a flank if the total APL stat of those contesting it is greater than that of operativos enemigos.
victoryPoints:
After you reveal this op, at the end of each punto de inflexión after the first, for each flank operativos amigos control, you score 1VP.
If operativos amigos also controlled that flank at the end of the previous punto de inflexión (excluding the first), you score 2VP instead.
You cannot score more than 2VP from this op per punto de inflexión.

ops.title: Retrieval
ops.reveal: The first time you score VP from this op.
ops.victoryPoints:
The first time each objective marker is searched by operativos amigos, you score 1VP.
At the end of the battle, for each of your Retrieval mission markers operativos amigos are carrying, you score 1VP.

ops.title: Scout Enemy Movement
ops.reveal: The first time a operativo amigo performs the Scout action.
ops.victoryPoints:
At the end of each punto de inflexión after the first, for each monitored operativo enemigo that's visible to operativos amigos, you score 1VP. Note that it doesn't have to be a operativo amigo that performed the Scout action.
You cannot score more than 2VP from this op per punto de inflexión.

ops.title: Sweep & Clear
ops.reveal: The first time an operativo enemigo is incapacitado while contesting an objective marker, or the first time a operativo amigo performs the Clear action (whichever comes first).
ops.additionalRules: When an operativo enemigo that contests an objective marker is incapacitado, that objective marker gains one of your Swept tokens (if it doesn't already have one) until the Ready step of the next Strategy phase.
ops.victoryPoints:
At the end of each punto de inflexión after the first, if operativos amigos control any objective markers that have one of your Swept tokens, you score 1VP.
If this is true and any of those objective markers are also cleared, you score 2VP instead.
You cannot score more than 2VP from this op per punto de inflexión.

ops.title: Dominate
ops.reveal: The first time an operativo enemigo is incapacitado by a operativo amigo.
ops.additionalRules: Each time a operativo amigo incapacitates an operativo enemigo, that operativo amigo gains one of your Dominate tokens.
ops.victoryPoints:
At the end of the third and fourth punto de inflexión, you can remove Dominate tokens from operativos amigos that aren't incapacitado. For each you remove, you score 1VP.
You cannot score more than 3VP from this op per punto de inflexión.

ops.title: Rout
ops.reveal: The first time you score VP from this op.
ops.victoryPoints:
Whenever a operativo amigo incapacitates an operativo enemigo, if that operativo amigo is within 6" of your opponent's drop zone, you score 1VP; if this is true and that operativo enemigo had a Wounds stat of 12 or more, you score 2VP instead.
You cannot score more than 2VP from this op per punto de inflexión.

ops.title: Plant Banner
ops.reveal: When you perform the Plant Banner action.
ops.victoryPoints: At the end of each punto de inflexión after the first, if your Banner mission marker is wholly within your opponent's territory and operativos amigos control it, you score 1VP; if that's true and no operativos enemigos contest it, you score 2VP instead. Note your Banner mission marker must be in the zona de combate (not being carried) to score.

ops.title: Martyrs
ops.reveal: The first time a operativo amigo is incapacitado while contesting an objective marker.
ops.additionalRules: Whenever a operativo amigo is incapacitado while contesting an objective marker, that marker gains one of your Martyr tokens. Note that this is only the first time each operativo is incapacitado, so if Un operativo is incapacitado, set back up (e.g. HIEROTEK CIRCLE Reanimation Protocols) and then subsequently incapacitado again, a second Martyr token cannot be gained as a result.
ops.victoryPoints:
At the end of each punto de inflexión after the first, if operativos amigos contest an objective marker that has one or more of your Martyr tokens, you can remove any of those tokens. For each token you remove, you score 1VP; if operativos amigos also control that marker, you score 2VP instead.
You cannot score more than 2VP from this op per punto de inflexión.

ops.title: Envoy
ops.reveal: The first time you select an envoy.
ops.additionalRules: As a STRATEGIC GAMBIT in each punto de inflexión after the first, select one operativo amigo to be your envoy until the Ready step of the next Strategy phase. You cannot select Un operativo you selected during a previous punto de inflexión.
ops.victoryPoints: At the end of each punto de inflexión after the first, if your envoy is wholly within enemy territory and not dentro del alcance de control of operativos enemigos, you score 1VP; if this is true and your envoy has not lost any wounds during that punto de inflexión, you score 2VP instead.

ops.title: Track Enemy
ops.reveal: The first time you score VP from this op.
ops.additionalRules: An operativo enemigo is being tracked if it's a valid target for a operativo amigo within 6" of it. That operativo amigo must have a Conceal order, cannot be a valid target for the operativo enemigo it's attempting to track, and cannot be dentro del alcance de control of operativos enemigos.
ops.victoryPoints:
At the end of each punto de inflexión after the first:
 - If one operativo enemigo is being tracked, you score 1VP, or 2VP instead if it's the fourth punto de inflexión.
 - If two or more operativos enemigos are being tracked, you score 2VP.
You cannot score more than 2VP from this op per punto de inflexión.

ops.title: Plant Devices
ops.reveal: The first time a operativo amigo performs the Plant Device action.
ops.victoryPoints:
At the end of each punto de inflexión after the first:
 - If your opponent's objective marker has one of your Device tokens, you score 1VP.
 - For each other objective marker operativos enemigos contest that has one of your Device tokens, you score 1VP.
You cannot score more than 2VP from this op per punto de inflexión.

ops.title: Steal Intelligence
ops.reveal: The first time an operativo enemigo is incapacitado.
ops.additionalRules:
Whenever an operativo enemigo is incapacitado, before it's removed from the zona de combate, place one of your Intelligence mission markers within its alcance de control.
operativos amigos can perform the Recoger Marcador action on your Intelligence mission markers, and for the purposes of that action's conditions, ignore the first Intelligence mission marker el operativo activo is carrying. In other words, each operativo amigo can carry up to two Intelligence mission markers, or one and one other marker.
ops.victoryPoints:
At the end of each punto de inflexión after the first, if any operativos amigos are carrying any of your Intelligence mission markers, you score 1VP.
You cannot score more than 2VP from this op per punto de inflexión.
At the end of the battle, for each of your Intelligence mission markers operativos amigos are carrying, you score 1VP.

ops.title: Secure
ops.victoryPoints:
At the end of each punto de inflexión after the first:
 - If any objective markers are secured by your kill team, you score 1VP.
 - If more objective markers are secured by your kill team than your opponent's kill team, you score 1VP.

ops.title: Loot
ops.victoryPoints: Whenever a operativo amigo performs the Loot action, you score 1VP (to a maximum of 2VP per punto de inflexión).

ops.title: Transmission
ops.victoryPoints:
At the end of each punto de inflexión after the first:
 - If operativos amigos control any transmitting objective markers, you score 1VP.
 - If operativos amigos control more transmitting objective markers than operativos enemigos do, you score 1VP.
You cannot score more than 2VP from this op per punto de inflexión.

ops.title: Orb
ops.additionalRules: At the start of the battle, the centre objective marker has the Orb token.
ops.victoryPoints: At the end of each punto de inflexión after the first, for each objective marker that operativos amigos control that doesn't have the Orb token, you score 1VP.

ops.title: Stake Claim
ops.additionalRules:
At the start of the Gambit step of each Strategy phase after the first, starting with the player with initiative, each player must select both one objective marker and one of the following claims for that punto de inflexión:
 - operativos amigos will control that objective marker at the end of this punto de inflexión.
 - operativos enemigos won't contest that objective marker at the end of this punto de inflexión.
Each player cannot select each objective marker more than once per battle (so they must select each objective marker once during the battle).
ops.victoryPoints:
At the end of each punto de inflexión, after the first:
 - If operativos amigos control more objective markers than operativos enemigos do, you score 1VP.
 - If your selected claim is true, you score 1VP.
You cannot score more than 2VP from this op per punto de inflexión.

ops.title: Energy Cells
ops.additionalRules:
operativos can perform the Recoger Marcador action upon each objective marker in the following turning points:
 - 2, but you must spend an additional 2AP (that action cannot be free and its AP cannot be reduced).
 - 3, but you must spend an additional 1AP (that action cannot be free and its AP cannot be reduced).
 - 4 (as normal).
Whenever Un operativo is carrying an objective marker, that operativo cannot be removed and set up again more than 6" away.
ops.victoryPoints:
At the end of each punto de inflexión after the first, if operativos amigos control more objective markers than operativos enemigos do, you score 1VP.
At the end of the battle, for each objective marker operativos amigos are carrying, you score 1VP.

ops.title: Download
ops.victoryPoints:
At the end of each punto de inflexión after the first, if operativos amigos control more objective markers than operativos enemigos do, you score 1VP. Ignore downloaded objective markers when determining this.
Whenever a operativo amigo performs the Download action during the third punto de inflexión, you score 1VP.
Whenever a operativo amigo performs the Download action during the fourth punto de inflexión, you score 2VP.

ops.title: Data
ops.victoryPoints:
At the end of the second and third punto de inflexión, if operativos amigos have performed more Compile Data actions during that punto de inflexión than operativos enemigos have, you score 1VP.
Whenever a operativo amigo performs the Send Data action, you score a number of VP equal to the number of Data points removed.

ops.title: Reboot
ops.additionalRules:
When setting up the battle, after setting up objective markers, number each objective marker 1-3.
At the start of the Gambit step of each Strategy phase, each player secretly selects one objective marker by putting a number of dice in their hand that matches that marker's number, then reveal simultaneously:
 - If both players selected the same one, that objective marker is inert during this punto de inflexión.
 - If not, the objective marker that neither player selected is inert during this punto de inflexión.
ops.victoryPoints: At the end of each punto de inflexión after the first, for each objective marker operativos amigos control, you score 1VP. Ignore inert objective markers when determining this.

actions.name: Secure
effects: One objective marker el operativo activo controls is secured by your kill team until the enemy kill team secures that objective marker.
conditions: Un operativo cannot perform this action during the first punto de inflexión, or while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

actions.name: Loot
effects: One objective marker el operativo activo controls is looted.
conditions: Un operativo cannot perform this action during the first punto de inflexión, while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo, or if that objective marker has already been looted during this punto de inflexión.

actions.name: Retrieve
effects: If el operativo activo controls an objective marker that hasn't been searched by operativos amigos, that operativo is now carrying one of your Retrieval mission markers and that objective marker has been searched by operativos amigos. operativos amigos can perform the Recoger Marcador action on your Retrieval mission markers.
conditions: Un operativo cannot perform this action during the first punto de inflexión, or while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

actions.name: Scout
effects: Select one ready operativo enemigo visible to and more than 6" from el operativo activo. That operativo enemigo is now monitored until the Ready step of the next Strategy phase.
conditions: Un operativo cannot perform this action while it has an Engage order, during the first punto de inflexión, or while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

actions.name: Clear
effects: An objective marker el operativo activo controls is cleared for the punto de inflexión.
conditions: Un operativo cannot perform this action during the first punto de inflexión, or while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

actions.name: Plant Banner
effects: Place your Banner mission marker within el operativo activo's alcance de control, wholly within your opponent's territory and more than 5" from a neutral zona de combate edge. operativos can perform the Recoger Marcador action on your Banner mission marker.
conditions: Un operativo cannot perform this action during the first punto de inflexión, while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo, or if a operativo amigo has already performed this action during the battle.

actions.name: Plant Device
effects: One objective marker el operativo activo controls gains one of your Device tokens.
conditions: Un operativo cannot perform this action during the first punto de inflexión, while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo, or if that objective marker already has one of your Device tokens.

actions.name: Initiate Transmission
effects: One objective marker el operativo activo controls is transmitting until the start of the next punto de inflexión.
conditions: Un operativo cannot perform this action during the first punto de inflexión, or while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

actions.name: Move Orb
effects:
If el operativo activo controls the objective marker that has the Orb token, move that token as follows:
 - If the centre objective marker has it, move it to either player's objective marker (your choice).
 - If a player's objective marker has it, move it to the centre objective marker.
conditions: Un operativo cannot perform this action during the first punto de inflexión, while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo, or if it doesn't control the objective marker that has the Orb token.

actions.name: Download
effects: One centre or opponent's objective marker el operativo activo controls is downloaded.
conditions: Un operativo cannot perform this action during the first or second punto de inflexión, while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo, or if that objective marker has already been downloaded during the battle.

actions.name: Compile Data
effects: One objective marker el operativo activo controls gains 1 Data point. Use a dice as a token to keep track of Data points at that objective marker.
conditions: Un operativo cannot perform this action during the first punto de inflexión, while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo, or if that objective marker has already gained a Data point during this punto de inflexión.

actions.name: Send Data
effects: Remove all Data points from an objective marker el operativo activo controls.
conditions: Un operativo cannot perform this action during the first, second or third punto de inflexión, while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo, or if that objective marker doesn't have any Data points to remove.

actions.name: Reboot
effects: One inert objective marker el operativo activo controls is no longer inert.
conditions: Un operativo cannot perform this action during the first punto de inflexión, or while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.
